H0.text: A ruler is the tool used to observe the cell wall of a leaf.

H1.text: A camera is the tool used to observe the cell wall of a leaf.

H2.text: Hand lens is the tool used to observe the cell wall of a leaf.

H3.text: Microscope is the tool used to observe the cell wall of a leaf.

A4.text: Microscopy is the science of investigating small objects and structures using a microscope.
